segments.text: I'm terrified just looking at this kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing uncontrollably, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't see it, she's too busy with her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle could cause someone to slip and fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy's on that shaky stool, reaching way up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll come crashing down with cookies flying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand is out, but she might get knocked over too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, adding to the instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby could topple in the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in light, but it can't brighten this danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems safe, unlike this hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around before something awful happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart is racing imagining the accident about to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
